problemWrapUp: The spider whips a non-sticky web around you and yanks you out of the web, up to the top of the shag carpet, which seems to have fused together enough to form paths in and out of the room.
name: Shag Carpet Room

exits.description: Oh no! You've run into dead end.  To the left, right and front of you you see nothing.  The only direction you can head is back the way you came.
You look up and see the ceiling
You look down and see carpet.

problemDescription: Apparently a spider has laid itself a nest amidst this ugly shag carpet, and you've walked right into its web.  Your guess as to the origins of the web prove terrifyingly accurate as a large black specimen slowly drops down from above.  Surprisingly it offers to pull you out of its web without eating you, but it requires you to solve a problem for it.
description: The carpet here is tall and orange, and smells like it hasn't been cleaned since it was first put in (and judging by the style, it was probably put in back when the Beatles were still popular).
